ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Providing font files that can be used by the 'showtext' package.
Providing font files that can be used by the 'showtext' package.

name: r-showtextdb
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-showtextdb
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/showtextdb_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/showtextdb/showtextdb_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 027f5d0ab91eb27c72b6e918a2915b6087f7408b66c1630d69b3e507dd609642

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-sysfonts >=0.7.1
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-sysfonts >=0.7.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('showtextdb')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('showtextdb')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=showtextdb
  license: Apache (>= 2.0)
  license_file: inst/fonts/LICENSE_Apache2.txt
  summary: Providing font files that can be used by the 'showtext' package.
  license_family: APACHE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: showtextdb
# Type: Package
# Title: Font Files for the 'showtext' Package
# Version: 2.0
# Date: 2017-09-09
# Author: Yixuan Qiu and authors/contributors of the included fonts. See file AUTHORS for details.
# Maintainer: Yixuan Qiu <yixuan.qiu@cos.name>
# Description: Providing font files that can be used by the 'showtext' package.
# Imports: sysfonts (>= 0.7.1), utils
# Suggests: curl
# License: Apache License (>= 2.0)
# Copyright: see file COPYRIGHTS
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2017-09-10 18:49:16 UTC; qyx
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2017-09-11 14:13:21 UTC
